analysis.description:
CoreController.distributeLeaderboardRewards has external calls inside a loop:
	- treasury.giveGold(users[i],_reward) (/unique_chucks/33/0x69980dfd271daf09b606b7fa1d872d98c98015a8.sol#337)

CoreController.distributeLeaderboardRewards has external calls inside a loop:
